generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Commissioner:wght@400;500;700&display=swap");:root{--curve:10px;--moderate_cyan:#3cb4ac;--dark_cyan:#147b74;--dark_gray:#666;--light_gray:#e6e6e6}*{box-sizing:border-box}html{scroll-behavior:smooth}#dark_overlay{display:none;position:absolute;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.5);top:0;left:0;height:100%;width:100%;z-index:1;overflow-x:hidden}body{display:flex;margin:0;position:relative;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;padding:35px
